dfeR 0.0.0.9013
  • Reference

R Markdown DfE National Statistic Output Format

Source: R/rmarkdown_templates.R
national_statistic.Rd

This function creates an R Markdown output format that generates documents in the style of DfE National Statistic Publications. 

national_statistic(...)

Arguments

...

All Parameters from rmarkdown::word_document are accepted

Details

To format an R Markdown document using this template add the function to the R Markdowns YAML header as follows:

title: "Name"
output: dfeR::national_statistic

You can also use the template in R Studio via File > New File > R Markdown > From Template ...

Examples

national_statistic()
